reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, comfortable, and soft. The size receives mixed feedback - while some say the oversized fit looks good, others report that the sleeves are too long. The quality also gets mixed reviews, with some finding it great while others say it's not great.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and soft
items.body: This is my new favorite fall accessory this year. It’s so cute to just throw over any tank top. And I’m a sucker for overly long bell sleeves. It’s so comforting. Read more
items.author: Angel Kisses

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and fun
items.body: So cute, exactly what is pictured. Would suggest air drying Read more
items.author: Ab

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Top
items.body: Great lightweight. Super convenient, lots of compliments. It does snag if you have things like jewelry sticking out but if that’s gonna piss you off, don’t buy it and then review 2 stars. It’s a great top, so just know what you’re purchasing and whether it fits your needs or not. It snags on me and I want 5 more. Read more
items.author: Katalina Eunice

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really cute, long sleeves
items.body: This was cute, but unfortunately the sleeves were way too long for me - I had to return it. It was cute, stretchy and comfortable though. Read more
items.author: Afton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute!
items.body: For the price this little over sweater is a cute accessory! It looks so cute on my teenage! Read more
items.author: destiny

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh
items.body: It's cute but the sleeves were way too long. They got caught on absolutely everything - my purse zipper, car door handle, my earrings. The quality is also not great. Because of the catches, and one wash, it's now got all these random strings all over. I guess it isn't terrible bc it kinda adds to the grunge aesthetic but for what I paid for it I just don't think it's worth that for what's essentially one wear in it's original form. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sweater is so cute!
items.body: I wear this often - I have a few others like it. This one is soft, it washes well and so comfortable! The arms are long for any tall girls out there! I am a muscular 5'11" build and i got an XL. Probably could've gone with the L but the oversized fit looks cute with a tight tank & leggings! Read more
items.author: KIMMI

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wash it first
items.body: Out of the package it smelled pretty bad. Washed it and it felt and smelled great. As long as you wash it (we did it on gentle and don’t have an agitator), you will be happy with it. Read more
items.author: Abby

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Green White Multi, Brown and White, Green Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
